apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices depicts a couple composed of a man and a person with medium-dark skin tones, beautifully framed by a luminous red heart.  Appleâ€™s design language imbues the figures with smooth gradients and rounded contours, creating an approachable and endearing visual.  The prominent, glossy heart signifies love, romance, or a profound emotional connection, making it a popular choice for expressing affection and unity in digital conversations.
